title: New: Reckoner – Hope & Grace
body:
Photograph by Rebecca Young.

This new outing from Sunderland’s **Reckoner** may well be the most exciting rock track I’ve heard this side of 2012. Combining bitter lyricism with a near-shoegaze inspired dirty riff, it’s three and a half minutes of intensely perfect indie rock, that’ll leave you yearning to chant along with the vicious chorus. _Hope & Grace_ contains moments of **Springsteen**\-esque inspiration, as well as more modern influences, such as the **mewithoutyou** styled vocals. Jealousy never sounded so good.

Check it out below.
